articles.content:

articles.title: Suresh Raina "Lost Loyalty Of MS Dhoni": Simon Doull On Former CSK Star Going Unsold In IPL Auction .. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Speaking on Suresh Raina getting unsold in the auction, former New Zealand cricketer Simon Doull listed "two to three" reasons that prompted CSK, as well as the other franchises, to ignore the veteran batter at the IPL auction.
articles.content: Suresh Raina will not take part in the Indian Premier League (IPL) for the first time since the inception of the tournament back in 2008. Raina, who was released by the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) ahea… [+1604 chars]
